project_prompt:
Frontend: React with Vite
Backend: Node.js with Express
Deployment: Docker

project_root/frontend/react/vite/src/mai.reason: These are standard directories and file structure for a React application with Vite.

project_root/frontend/react/vite/src/App.reason: This path follows a common organization structure for React projects with Vite.

project_root/frontend/react/vite/vite.co.reason: The path follows common structure for a React project with Vite and is crucial for its correct functioning.

project_root/frontend/react/vite/index.h.reason: This path structure follows common conventions for organizing a project with React and Vite.

project_root/frontend/react/webpack.reason: This path is not required for the given project setup with React and Vite instead of Webpack

project_root/frontend/vue.reason: The path specifies a Vue.js implementation instead of React which is specified in the project context.

project_root/backend/node/express/src/se.reason: These are common directories and files for a Node.js Express backend project with the specified tech stack.

project_root/backend/node/express/src/ro.reason: This path structure follows a common practice for organizing backend Node.js applications with Express and provides clarity for team members.

project_root/backend/node/express/packag.reason: These folders and files are standard for a Node.js backend project with Express.js and Docker deployment.

project_root/backend/django.reason: Project specifies Node.js with Express, not Django (Python)

project_root/deployment/docker/Dockerfil.reason: This structure includes a Dockerfile for deployment, which is necessary for building and containerizing the application.

project_root/deployment/serverless.reason: Serverless deployment is not applicable with the given tech stack, which includes Docker for deployment.
